description: New Cabinet to Hold its Inaugural Meeting Today
article_title: New Cabinet to Hold its Inaugural Meeting Today
article_body_paragraphs: The new Cabinet of Ministers are scheduled to meet this afternoon (30) for the first time under the patronage of President Anura Kumara Dissanayake.
The Cabinet is scheduled to take several important decisions at this meeting, while the media will be briefed regarding these decisions following the meeting.
